channel.title: MySQL on Chmouel's blog
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on Chmouel's blog

item.title: What type of MySQL table schemas
item.description: Since I always forget stuff like this. This is the SQL query to detect mysql table schemas type (thanks to Darren.B) : SELECT table_name, table_schema, table_type, engine FROM information_schema.tables where table_schema not in ('information_schema', 'mysql');
